name: Little Miss Beauty Salon: Fashion Doll First Date - Girls Makeover Games
name_original: Little Miss Beauty Salon: Fashion Doll First Date - Girls Makeover Games
description:
It's your fashion doll's first date and its SUPER IMPORTANT! Your stylish doll is in desperate need of your fashion skills! Help her get ready for her FIRST date! Everybody knows that a girls first date is most important. Do you have what it takes to impress your sweet heart? Then prove it here in this fashion doll salon game!

Start by giving your pretty fashion doll a skin treatment. Give her clear and beautiful skin before you can do her makeup! Then when her skin is ready, it's time for the cosmetics. Give her beautiful make up to match the outfit and dress you have designed for her in the makeover salon!

You must get your fashion doll ready for the date! Give your crush a date night he will never forget! Make sure he can never take his eyes of you! It's not easy! Are you up for the challenge? Download it NOW!!!

Features:
- A HUGE variety of dresses and outfits to choose from!
- Tons of accessories and jewelry to match with the outfits
- A wide range of beautiful make up selection
- So many different beauty and cosmetic tools to help treat your dolls skin!

How to play:
- Tap on the touch screen to choose and match your outfits and accessories
- Drag to use the skin care tools and swipe to apply the cosmetic treatment to your dolls skin!
- Then scroll to choose the perfect make up and finally swipe to apply it!
- Once done, show it to your friends and show them what an awesome fashion expert you are!

Start practicing your date night makeover skills right here! It's free! and its SUPER fun! Turn your doll from a pretty girl into a beautiful princess!
